document.full_text: chevron corp  will buy 228,000 acres in the marcellus shale, expanding its position in the one of the hottest natural gas shale fields under development in the united states.
document.title: chevron to buy new stakes in marcellus shale
lines_and_colors: chevron corp  will buy 228,000 acres in the marcellus shale, expanding its position in the one of the hottest natural gas shale fields under development in the united states.
